title: Did you lose 71 per cent of Trump's mid - term ratifications in 2018?
subtitle: This figure may be accurate if it is limited to persons supported by Trump through his Twitter account, but it is not an accurate representation of the success of his overall list of endorsements.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Some 71 per cent of the candidates accredited to Trump lost their mid-term elections in 2018.
